summary: This bat file makes it possible to equip Serana\'s hood on you and others.
descriptionHtml:
Sorry for my bad english!

This bat file makes it possible to equip Serana\'s hood on both male and female characters.

I know that the \"bat hoodother1\" dosen\'t work, and I don\'t know why. Sorry.

HOW TO USE:
1. Install the mod.
2. Open up Skyrim.
3.Open the console.
4.Type \"bat hood\" and the hood is automaticly equipped.

To unequip it again, open the console and type \"bat hood1\" and the hood is gone.

To use on other NPCs, open console, click the NPC and type \"bat hoodother\"

To unequip it from them again, type \"bat hoodother1\"

Of couse, this requires Dawnguard.

New in 1.2: Added ReadMe file to the main file.

New in 1.1: Fixed the mod and added the ability to equip it on others.

New in 1.0: Mod release.
author: RadioactiveGuns
